Package com.schlimm.forkjoindip

Interface Summary
ForkAndJoinTaskPrototype<A> Interface to be implemented to enhance ForkJoinTask and enable them to participate in the dip-Framework.
 

Class Summary
ComposableResult<A> Abstract class that wraps the result of a fork and join task.
ComputationActivityBridge<A,B> Bridge to the component that implements the actual computation.
DecomposableInput<A> Abstract class that wraps the input of a ForkJoinTask task.
ForkAndJoinProcessor<A extends ForkAndJoinTaskPrototype<?>> Abstract class that isolates the logic how a list of input objects can be distributed across multiple threads using ForkJoinTask#fork() operations.
GenericRecursiveTask A generic recursive task that implements the typical fork and join workflow.
GenericSplitProcessor Generic implementation of a scenario where an input is decomposed into two parts that get distributed accross two threads using ForkJoinTask#fork()
